textos_fuente.text: Home - Admiral enquiries@admiralgroup.com 020 7877 8500 ‚úï Home Job Search Candidate Hub Employer Hub Sectors BEAUTY & FITNESS BUSINESS SERVICES FINANCE & ACCOUNTING HOSPITALITY HR, LEARNING & DEVELOPMENT RESTAURANTS, BARS & PUBS SALES & MARKETING SECURITY SENIOR / EXECUTIVE About OUR TEAM TESTIMONIALS WORK FOR US NEWS REGISTER WITH US REGISTER WITH US RECRUITMENT IS OUR PASSION We are a market leader with over 25 years of experience in permanent and temporary recruitment across the retail, facilities management, security and hospitality sectors, with roles ranging from management to craft-level positions. We are recruiting. Check our vacancy list using the search below. Search for Jobs Recruitment is personal and is often about winning hearts as well as minds. Confidentiality, honesty and relationship-building are the foundations of every client assignment we undertake. We pride ourselves on being long-standing recruitment experts in retail, commercial and hospitality recruitment markets, specialising in permanent, interim and temporary personnel recruitment at all levels. We are a family business, founded by husband and wife team Nick Dixon and Paula Rogers 25 years ago. Read more about our story here: About Admiral What makes us different? Since 1995, we have placed over 138,000 candidates into jobs at successful companies. Our founding values of integrity, agility and compassion have never been more important than they are today. We take the time to get to know clients and candidates. Managing a workplace? Get in touch to find out how we can help Employer Hub How we're supporting our Clients! "At Mediabrands we love working with Admiral. You are always very helpful and professional. Every time when we need help, even 'immediately', you are doing everything to make it happen which make us extremely grateful. I would especially like to thank Priyanka for her patience, kind words and helpfulness for all this time. You are an absolute star! Thanks to you once again, our work becomes much more pleasant because of Admiral" Kamila Jaskiewicz, Hospitality Manager - BaxterStorey Mediabrands Get in touch today! ‚ÄúAdmiral is certainly an agency like no other! They don‚Äôt always get it right but they certainly do try their hardest to do so. It‚Äôs my favourite agency to work with, not just because they provide great staff for my business but also because they sort out any issues as soon as they appear. Marieta who looks after our account is certainly a breath of fresh air and a joy to work with‚Äù. Flavio, GM - CH&CO Get in touch today "Rebecca and Olivia have been pivotal in the success of our recruitment program. In an era where recruitment in hospitality is difficult, Admiral Recruitment have assisted us in filling a number of positions in different levels across departments. Instead of being blindly sent CVs, they seek and screen candidates aligned with our values and are fit for the role. This, coupled with their engagement, results in roles being filled in a timely manner with quality staff, minimising disruption to the business and setting us up for success." - Daniel Ball, Phyllis Court Members Club Get in touch today Latest News Comments Box SVG icons Used for the like, share, comment, and reaction icons Admiral  Recruitment 1 years ago We are hiring a talented and experienced Beauty Therapist for a luxury beauty and wellness Client, in London If this role sounds perfect for you, please send your CV to: alexandrac@admiralgroup.com or call: 07946111146 ... NEW PRESIDENT FOR GENERAL CIGAR AND EVP FOR HANDMADE CIGARS GLOBALLY - Scandinavian Tobacco Group Go to content Cookies About us Facts and figures Sustainability Vision and strategy Reports and Documents Management Executive Board Board of Directors Our Brands Governance Our Tobacco Making of Tobacco History of Tobacco Investor Investor Portal News Shareholder information Outlook Financial calendar Annual General Meeting Debt Information Financial Reports Presentations Capital Markets Day 2023 Careers Contact Delivery Instructions Back NEW PRESIDENT FOR GENERAL CIGAR AND EVP FOR HANDMADE CIGARS GLOBALLY Share LinkedIn Facebook Twitter Email Scandinavian Tobacco Group sets new management for its handmade cigar business. Regis Broersma becomes new President of General Cigar Company which is a leader in the US market for handmade and premium cigars. He succeeds Dan Carr who has stepped down and leaves the Group. Regis Broersma (38) is Dutch born and has a comprehensive, international background in sales, marketing and general management. Regis Broersma has worked in the Netherlands, the Czech Republic, Denmark, the UK and the US. Currently, he is Managing Director of STG Germany. Regis Broersma has worked in the cigar industry since 2002 and has a great passion for cigars. In addition, Scandinavian Tobacco Group assigns the responsibility of its entire global handmade cigar businesses to an Executive Vice President. Craig Reynolds assumes this responsibility which includes General Cigar, its international business and Cigars International which is a leading online retailer in the US. Craig Reynolds continues as President for Cigars International. Niels Frederiksen, CEO of Scandinavian Tobacco Group, says: ‚ÄúI am happy to announce Regis Broersma as new President of General Cigar. Regis has the experience and the innovative approach needed to continue the impressive development of General Cigar together with its management team. Our handmade cigar business accounts for 25% of our net sales and is a growth engine of our business. We want to reinforce this development by adding executive management capacity for the entire handmade business globally.‚Äù General Cigar holds a leading market position in the US market for handmade cigars. Cigars International has built a leading position in online and catalogue retail sales of handmade cigars in the United States. General Cigar and Cigars International continue to be run as two separate, stand-alone businesses. For further information please contact Director of Group Communications Kaspar Bach Habersaat, kaspar.bach@st-group.com or phone +45 7220 7152. U.S. Media Contact: Victoria McKee/General Cigar Company, Victoria.mckee@st-group.com or phone: +1 732 721 0317 ABOUT GENERAL CIGAR COMPANY General Cigar Co. is a leading manufacturer and marketer of handcrafted cigars for the premium market in the US. The company is owned by Scandinavian Tobacco Group. Committed to delivering cigars of the finest quality, General Cigar‚Äôs skilled artisans produce Macanudo¬Æ, Cohiba¬Æ, La Gloria Cubana¬Æ, Partagas¬Æ, CAO¬Æ, Punch¬Æ, Hoyo de Monterrey¬Æ, Excalibur¬Æ and several other leading premium brands in the company‚Äôs Dominican, Honduran and Nicaraguan factories. In addition, the company cultivates proprietary tobacco which is used exclusively in its blends and has a dedicated R&D practice that develops new varieties of tobacco and revitalizes vintage seeds. Based in Richmond, VA, General Cigar sells through wholesalers and retailers in the US. General Cigar also operates Club Macanudo¬Æ, a cigar bar in New York City. Read more: www.cigarworld.com . ABOUT SCANDINAVIAN TOBACCO GROUP - a world leading manufacturer of cigars and traditional pipe tobacco - approx. 8,200 employees in the Dominican Republic, Honduras, Nicaragua, Indonesia, Europe, New Zealand, Australia, Canada and the US The Group‚Äôs brand portfolio contains more than 200 international, regional and local tobacco brands, including the cigar brands Caf√© Cr√®me, La Paz, Henri Wintermans, Macanudo, CAO, Partagas (US) and Cohiba (US). Pipe tobacco brands include Captain Black, Erinmore, Borkum Riff and W.√ò. Larsen, while leading fine-cut tobacco brands include Bugler, Break, Escort, Bali Shag and Tiedemanns. The Group is ultimately owned by two Danish foundations (51%) ‚Äì the Augustinus Foundation and Det Obelske Familiefond ‚Äì and by Swedish Match (49%). Both Danish foundations have been active in the tobacco industry for more than 250 years. Swedish Match is a publicly owned company listed on the Stockholm Stock Exchange. Read more: www.st-group.com . Scandinavian Tobacco Group A/S Sydmarken 42 DK-2860 S√∏borg Denmark CVR 31 08 01 85 Explore our must-win battles stories FROM ROUGH DIAMOND TO BUSINESS LEADER Read More A DISCIPLINED AND FOCUSED APPROACH TO M&A Read More SEEKING THE SINGLE TRUTH Read More INCREASING EFFICIENCY, TOGETHER Read More Company News Keep up with news and press releases from Scandinavian Tobacco Group by subscribing to our company announcements. Privacy Policy Creekside Cigar Co respects your privacy. If you sign up for any of our engagement and outreach programs, including those that use SMS text messaging, we ONLY use information you provide to transmit your mobile messages and, upon request, respond to you directly. This includes sharing information with our program partners, message content providers, phone companies, and vendors who assist us in the delivery of mobile messages. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, WE DO NOT SELL, RENT, LOAN, TRADE, LEASE OR OTHERWISE TRANSFER FOR PROFIT ANY PHONE NUMBERS OR CUSTOMER INFORMATION COLLECTED THROUGH PROGRAMS TO ANY THIRD PARTY. We do reserve the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation or governmental request, to avoid liability, or to protect our rights or property. When you complete forms online or otherwise provide us information at point of sale, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and true information. As our guest, we are here to help you carefully select a cigar that‚Äôs right for you. Our resident tobacconist has extensive knowledge about the many offerings available and is ready to assist in making the right choice for you or as gifts for the cigar smokers in your life. Board Members - Cigar Rights Skip to content Home About Us Officers & Directors Sponsors Executive Team Ambassadors Cigar News Cigar News Legislative News Regulatory News Legal News General Interest International News Judge Mehta‚Äôs Decision H.R. 2111 Resources Cigar Events Find Great American Cigar Shops Premium Cigar Retailer Resources Join CRA Become an Individual Member Join as a Great American Cigar Shop Join as a Cigar Manufacturer Take Action Actions FAQs Find Legislator Sign Up Voting Tools Donate to CRA Individual Donations Manufacturers Contact Us CRA Officers and Directors Board members support CRA members and all facets of the cigar industry Click Here to Donate to CRA Today! Officers and Directors The Cigar Rights of America (CRA) Board of Directors consists of some of the most respected figures in the premium cigar industry. Serving in a volunteer capacity, these leaders bring an unparalleled dedication and commitment to their roles. Their devotion to the craft, coupled with their extensive expertise, shapes CRA's mission to protect the rights of cigar enthusiasts. Their leadership, guidance, and steadfast financial support are crucial in ensuring the continued growth and vitality of the industry, embodying a true passion for preserving the rich tradition of premium cigars. Robert Levin Chairman Emeritus Owner, Ashton Distributors Robert Levin, the President of Holt‚Äôs Cigar Holdings, has a 50-year career in the cigar industry, spanning both retail and wholesale. His journey began by sweeping the floors of his father‚Äôs landmark cigar store in Philadelphia, Holts. In the 1970s, Robert took over the family business and led a significant transformation in the 1980s by introducing the iconic Ashton brand. Founded in 1985, Ashton Distributors, Inc., a family-owned company headquartered in Philadelphia, embodies the tradition of the premium cigar industry with a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. Cory Bappert Vice President CEO, Oliva Cigar Company With over 16 years in the cigar industry, Cory Bappert is the CEO of Oliva Cigars, a leading global premium and cigar manufacturer. Cory joined Oliva Cigars in 2006 as Vice President of Sales and has driven the company's growth, expanding its market presence and reputation for quality. Drew Newman Secretary Owner, J.C. Newman Cigar Company Drew Newman continues the tradition started by his great-grandfather in 1895 as a fourth-generation leader of J.C. Newman Cigar Company, America‚Äôs oldest family-owned premium cigar manufacturer. Before fully joining the family business, Drew worked as Chief of Staff for a national nonprofit and as Legislative Director at the Council of the District of Columbia. He holds a Bachelor of Arts from Williams College and a Master of Public Policy from Princeton University, positioning him well to lead J.C. Newman Cigar Company into the future. Gary Pesh President & Treasurer Owner, Old Virginia Tobacco Company Gary Pesh has over 40 years in the tobacco business, starting in 1980 at the family business, Tobacco Barns. He expanded the business from three stores to seven and rebranded it as Old Virginia Tobacco Co., where he now serves as president. A former city councilman in Roundhill, VA, Gary has served on multiple boards, including IPCPR (now the Premium Cigar Association) , where he became president. Since 2009, Gary has been an active member of the Cigar Rights of America board, advocating for the rights of cigar enthusiasts and the industry. Throughout his career, Gary has exemplified dedication, leadership, and a passion for the cigar industry. His contributions have not only strengthened his own business but have also had a lasting impact on the broader cigar community. Carlito Fuente Owner, A. Fuente Cigars Carlos "Carlito" P. Fuente, Jr. is a third-generation cigar artisan and the Chairman of A. Fuente & Company. The company, founded in 1912 by his grandfather, started with cigars crafted in the family's home. Today, A. Fuente & Company produces and distributes millions of cigars annually. Carlito, along with his father, transformed A. Fuente & Company from its beginnings in Ybor City, Florida, into a globally recognized manufacturer of premium hand-rolled cigars. Carlito co-founded, along with Newman family, the Cigar Family Charitable Foundation, recognized by the United Nations for its community impact in the Dominican Republic, which includes a K-12 school, community kitchen, medical and dental clinics, sports facilities, an organic farm, and infrastructure enhancements. Pete Johnson Owner, Tatuaje Cigars Inc | Havana Cellars Pete Johnson entered the tobacco industry in 1993, starting in retail in Los Angeles, California. In 1997, he became the Director of Retail for Grand Havana Enterprises. Pete's passion for cigars led him to start his own line, Tatuaje, in 2003, collaborating with Jose "Pepin" Garcia of My Father Cigars. Tatuaje quickly gained popularity, establishing Pete and his brand as significant players for the next generation of cigar industry leaders. Jorge Padr√≥n Owner, Padr√≥n Cigar Company Jorge Padr√≥n is a key figure in the premium cigar world, representing Padron Cigars. Raised in a family dedicated to tobacco cultivation and cigar craftsmanship, Jorge learned the intricacies of cigar production from his father, Jose Orlando Padron. Under his leadership, Padron Cigars expanded globally, maintaining a commitment to quality and authenticity. Jorge's work has earned Padron Cigars numerous accolades and a devoted following. His dedication ensures the Padron name remains synonymous with high-quality cigars. Sathya Levin CEO, ASHTON Distributors Sathya Levin is the second generation leader of Ashton Cigars with his father, Robert Levin. Ashton Cigars, founded in 1985, is known for producing premium cigars of high quality. Throughout his career, Sathya has been instrumental in driving the growth and success of Ashton Cigars. His leadership has ensured that the company remains at the forefront of the industry, known for its innovation, quality, and integrity. Sathya's deep knowledge of the cigar business, combined with his strategic vision, has helped Ashton Cigars maintain its position as a leader in the market. Rocky Patel Owner, Rocky Patel Cigars Rocky Patel is a prominent figure in the cigar industry, known for his dedication to perfection. Introduced to cigars in the early 1990s while practicing law in Los Angeles, Rocky developed a deep interest in cigars. He ventured into cigar manufacturing during the boom, finding success with Indian Tabac cigars rolled in Honduras. In 2003, he rebranded his company to Rocky Patel Premium Cigars. Known for his hard work, Rocky's mission is to share his passion for exceptional cigars with enthusiasts worldwide. Tony Gomez La Flor Dominicana Tony Gomez is the newest addition to CRA's board and we are proud to have La Flor Dominicana represented on our board once again. Tony brings a literal lifetime of experience with him, having watched his father Litto, and his business partner and spouse Inez, grow La Flor Dominicana from the ground up during Tony's childhood. We value the enthusiasm, experience, and intellect that Tony brings to the CRA board. Directors Emeriti Carlos Fuente, Sr. (1935-2016) President (Former) of Arturo Fuente Cigars and Founding Manufacturer Member of CRA From a humble beginning in Ybor City, Florida, making cigars from his parents' home, Fuente Sr. built Fuente into an international powerhouse, with its cigars known and revered the world over. His company today makes more than 30 million cigars a year in Santiago, Dominican Republic, all of them by hand. Carlos was in the cigar business his entire life. Together with his son, Carlito, he managed all aspects of the worldwide Fuente cigar manufacturing businesses. Jeff Borysiewicz President and Founder, Corona Cigar Co. & Florida Sungrown, LLC and Founding Retailer Member of CRA Jeff Borysiewicz is the founder and CEO of Corona Cigar Company and Florida Sungrown, LLC. In 2008, following a hard-fought legislative battle, Jeff, along with Keith Park, founder & CEO of Prometheus International, realized that the premium cigar industry lacked a true advocate in Washington, DC. This led to the creation of Cigar Rights of America (CRA). From 2008 to 2014, Jeff served as chairman of CRA. During his leadership, CRA grew from a small operation to an industry leader in tobacco policy. Today, CRA is the most prominent voice for premium cigar advocacy in Washington, DC. Keith Park Founder and CEO of Prometheus International and God of Fire Cigars and Founding Manufacturer Member of CRA Keith Park started out working in his family's lighter importation business in California in the 1980's. In 1992, Keith launched the now-famous luxury lighter brand Prometheus. After the success of the Prometheus brand's expansion into collectible humidors, Keith found himself in discussions with Carlito Fuente in 2002, which lead to the creation of the God of Fire line of cigars. In 2008, Keith worked tirelessly to ward of a new round of tax legislation with Jeff Borysiewicz and other manufacturers, when they both realized the need for an advocacy group dedicated to premium cigars, and they helped found CRA. The Protect Cigar Freedom Plan JOIN CIGAR RIGHTS OF AMERICA PROTECT YOUR RIGHT TO ENJOY PREMIUM CIGARS CONTINUE TO ENJOY YOUR FREEDOM IN PEACE TODAY AND INTO THE FUTURE JOIN CRA Contact The CRA (800) 460-0729 210 King Street Alexandria, VA 22314 info@cigarrights.org Additional Resources Home About Us Team Cigar Events Cigar News Take Action Donate Contact Us Join CRA About Us Cigar Rights of America (CRA) is the first and only grassroots, consumer-based public advocacy group fighting to protect the individual‚Äôs right to enjoy premium cigars. As the anti-tobacco movement‚Äôs reach has broadened over the past 20 years, CRA has continued to advocate for all facets of the premium cigar community. Membership is open to everyone, including cigar enthusiasts, retailers, and manufacturers across the country. CRA was founded to ensure that everyone has the right to enjoy premium cigars and freely participate in a relaxing social activity. Secure Online Payments Accepted ¬© 2024 Cigar Rights of America. In the late 90's Atlantic cigar expanded their expertise and services around the world, by launching the virtual cigar store www.AtlanticCigar.com. This was one of the first online shops available to order premium, handmade cigars, and cigar accessories. With a simple layout and an easy to use website, combined with our employee's knowledge of cigars, and our industry leading prices, Atlantic had developed a blueprint for growth that has worked for over 20 years! And in late 2017 we launched our new, cutting edge website! Atlantic Cigar Company of PA was named "Best online mail order retailer in the U.S. (2005), by Cigar Cyclopedia. We also operate two sister retail stores under the name The Cigar Republic in New York and Connecticut. Thank you for choosing AtlanticCigar.com for your products, we pride ourselves in providing all customers, with the best product available, at the best prices, while still providing exceptional customer service. As we have proven, it can be done in today's internet world. If you would like additional information on a certain box of cigars, humidors or any other product offered feel free to Email customer service anytime, one of our tobacconists will be able to help you. Please take the time and register, this will expedite the ordering process on future orders. Our Family name is on every package, we guarantee everything we sell or we will replace it! Enjoy your cigars and good smoking, Paul J. Scipioni, President, Atlantic Cigar Co, LLC Our History - Then and Now. 2017 marks another chapter in Atlantic's growth, with a new, state of the art web site. Making a quantum leap from our original site, we've incorporated all the latest technology offered for online shoppers, as well as some custom features that only Atlantic Cigar can offer its customers. It's been a long and tough road made up of a lot of long hours and blood, sweat, (no tears, come on we're all manly men here!). But we would not have gotten this far without you, our loyal customers. For all the members of our NY & CT stores, our loyal internet and mail order customers, we want to thank you for 20 years of growth, and helping us get this far. We want you to know that once you buy from us, you become part of our family, and above all we look out for and take care of our family. Our Guarantee We sell all our products for deep discounts, we have the lowest prices across the board on all of our items, bottom-line AtlanticCigar.com has the best prices, selection & service on the NET! It's the reason family owned AtlanticCigar.com has become one of the fast growing cigar stores in the nation. - Our cigars are shipped directly from our state-of-the art humidor, we guarantee freshness! - We are a member of the IPCPR & CRA (Cigar Rights of America). - Our staff knows what they are selling, and can provide you service every step of the ordering process! - Best designed web site in the industry, making ordering simple and ease. - The first members buying club, allowing you huge savings and special deals. - We only sell Premium Cigars, NO SECONDS!! Unless labeled as such! Our prices maybe the lowest around but our quality and customer service is second to none. - We support our Armed Forces, and will ship to APO's / FPO's Worldwide. We only charge actual shipping charges. - We Do Not sell or rent our customer information to any third parties. All customer information is used for internal purposes only! Sign Up For Daily Deals! Customers evaluated the effort they needed to make to contact customer service as easy . Close How to Contact Admirals Club Customer Service? Most Popular Number: (800) 237-7971 Total calls: 44 Issues resolved: 2 Last call: Jun 18, 2025 Winnie Murugi PissedConsumer Reporter What Is The Admirals Club Customer Service Phone Number? Admirals Club phone number for contacting the customer support department is 800-237-7971. If you need to cancel your membership, to get more information about your existing membership or address any other questions, call this line between 8 am ‚Äì 10 pm ET on any day of the week. The line is available for callers within the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico. The professional Admirals Club customer care team is ready to assist you with any issue. What Is The Admirals Club Email Address? If your request is not tie-critical and doesn‚Äôt require urgent resolution, consider contacting the company via email. Admirals Club email for general customer care inquiries, issues and requests is admirals.club@aa.com. Alternatively, you can submit a request via the Admirals Club website. Once you submit your message, it will be forwarded directly to the Admirals Club customer support team. Along with reaching out to the company via email, you can send a message via social media platforms such as Twitter, YouTube, and LinkedIn. What Is The Admirals Club Headquarters Address? The company is headquartered in Florida. The head office address is 2615 Lake Dr, Riviera Beach, Florida 33404, United States. Admirals Club address for mailing is PO Box 619616, MD 8A508, DFW Airport, TX 75261-9616. Please use this address to contact the company via regular mail and send documents, requests, and other correspondence. What Are The Admirals Club Hours Of Operation? Depending on a location, Admirals Club lounges operation hours vary. For example, the lounge in Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport operates daily from 5 am to 8.15 pm while Admirals Club lounge in Austin Bergstrom International is open from 4.45 am to 9.15 pm Monday through Sunday. You can find the full list of all lounges and their operation hours on the Admirals Club website. Speaking about customer support services, they are available daily from 8 am to 10 pm ET. The first Club began operating in 1939 at the premises of LaGuardia Airport. Initially, membership in the Admirals Club was by the airlines‚Äô invitation only. Today all people may join the club. There are 4 ways: apply online, call Member services, stop by any Admirals Club location, or apply for the City Executive World Elite MasterCard. Available membership plans are individual annual membership, spousal annual membership, 30-day membership, and one-day passes. All members can enjoy such amenities as conference rooms, cyber cafes, work areas, personal travel assistance, children‚Äôs play areas, and many more. There are over 50 Admirals Clubs worldwide.
